Title: Greenways [City of Madison, Wisconsin] {2017}
Description:
This data layer represents greenways in the City of Madison, Wisconsin in 2017. A greenway is a strip of undeveloped land near an urban area, set aside for recreational use or environmental protection.
Archived dataset at UW-Madison. For the most current version of this data please visit: https://data-cityofmadison.opendata.arcgis.com/
Creator: Wisconsin--Madison
